Posts.Content: Hi, my mets are in my bones and recent 1 met in liver. Had liver ablation. Pet scan/ mri shows liver met resolved. Still have plenty of Mets in bones. I’m currently on Abraxane. I was diagnosed with Stage 4 in 2013. May I ask where u go for treatment? I may be moving to Albany area, I saw you were from Waterveliet area.
Posts.Title: Met Breast cancer to the bones

Posts.Content: Liver ablation for my case was surgery where they used heat to destroy the met. 4 hour procedure, stayed overnight 1 night at hospital. Yes I’ve had it in my bones since 2013 making me stage 4. Originally diagnosed in 2010 with stage 2 ( had surgery, chemo). Abraxane is IV chemo, before that I was on Navelbine which also is an IV chemo. I’ve exhausted all the Aromatase Inhibitors so thats why I’m on chemo now. If I do end up moving I think I’ll go with the doctors at Albany Med.
Posts.Title: Met Breast cancer to the bones

Posts.Content: What doctor at Albany med are you seeing?
Posts.Title: Met Breast cancer to the bones
